items.sentence: Tom will be ready for us in about ten minutes.
Tom didn\'t get the raise he\'d been promised.
Without your help, Tom doesn\'t have a chance.
I don\'t think Tom knows what you want to eat.
I don\'t think Tom knows where I used to live.
I don\'t think Tom knows who did that for him.
I don\'t think that I can do this without Tom.
Tom tried to solve the problem, but couldn\'t.
I think Tom and Mary are both still in prison.
I think both Tom and Mary are still in prison.
I saw Tom standing next to Mary\'s motorcycle.
Tom will explain it to you when he comes back.
Tom will land in Boston in an hour and a half.
Tom hasn\'t yet done what he said he would do.
People love to check out each other\'s houses.
Tom opened up the bag with a pair of scissors.
I don\'t like to eat where people are smoking.
I haven\'t been sick for the past three years.
Tom is the only one who didn\'t do that wrong.
I haven\'t seen Tom this angry in a long time.
